data.title: Water Walking is the real deal
data.text: I love the opportunity to water walk at the Aquatic Center. It is a wonderful and relaxing workout. Week nights are especially great to wind down.

data.title: Great for all ages
data.text: They have something for everyone. There's a pool for small children, lap pool, large pool with diving boards and a lazy river. The changing rooms/bathrooms are nice and clean. You can rent a locker for cheap. I just lay my bag on the ground and nothing's ever been taken. The concession stand is nice. The changing rooms are large enough for parent and child to fit into one. There are also a lot of life guards on duty.

data.title: Love the FAC
data.text: The pool opens at 11:00 for adult exercise till 1:00, seven days a week.  The toddler pool is open for kids with adults under 7 or 8 during this time.  The first two hours are a great time to exercise or just relax by the pool.  It is very clean and a fun place to be on a hot summer day.

data.title: Excellent water park!
data.text:
This waterpark has tons of activities for the whole family.
For a reasonable admission price you get access to:
1) children's pool with play structure, water dumping bucket and waterslide
2) Lazy river
3) full size pool with lane swimming, free swim with basketball nets
4) Diving boards and diving platforms
5) large waterslides both with and without inflatable tubes
There are also shaded areas for rest, and a cafe area with reasonably priced food and healthy snacks
A great place for the whole family.

data.title: Local Swimming Pool
data.text: This is the local swimming pool, like lot of the modern pools it has a variety of pools, slide, etc. Very nice pool and reasonably priced
